definition: until/(used in combination with words like 到[dao4] or 至[zhi4] in constructs of the form 到...為止|到...为止)
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
to stop at this point/to end here/to call it a day

sentences.english: It is now the highest-grossing independent British film of all time.
sentences.chinese: 如今，这已成为迄今为止最成功的英国独立电影。

sentences.english: Kneading dough by hand until the non-stick hand up.
sentences.chinese: 用手揉面团，直到不粘手为止。

sentences.english: I put up an advertisement in the newspaper for the sale of my car, but there have been no responses so far.
sentences.chinese: 我在报纸上登了卖车广告，但是到目前为止尚无回音。

sentences.english: This is the first study to ever report such an association.
sentences.chinese: 这是迄今为止首次报道存在这种相关性。

sentences.english: The company has since sold more than 1million of the cars around the world.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止公司已经在全世界范围内售出100万辆。

sentences.english: Can you describe one of the best concerts you have ever seen?
sentences.chinese: 你可以描述一下迄今为止你看过的最好的演唱会吗？

sentences.english: Increment the revenue to date for the district.
sentences.chinese: 增加该地区至今为止的收入。

sentences.english: It was for this reason that Parvati, his wife, sought him everywhere without results.
sentences.chinese: 为止，他的妻子帕娃蒂，到处寻找他而毫无结果。

sentences.english: B&TF: Who is your most favorite character you have played so far and why?
sentences.chinese: 直到目前为止，妳们最喜欢哪一个曾演过的角色？

sentences.english: Ron Artest doesn't read - he stares down books until they give up the information.
sentences.chinese: 阿泰不阅读，他盯着书，直到他们浮出字为止。

sentences.english: So far in this article, I have only considered microbenchmarks.
sentences.chinese: 在本文中，到目前为止只考虑了微基准测试。

sentences.english: So far, 952 people have agreed to be notified of their test results by text messenge.
sentences.chinese: 迄今为止，已有952人同意通过短信获知检验结果。

sentences.english: But the study says the United States was an important exception -- at least so far.
sentences.chinese: 但该研究称，美国是一个特例，至少目前为止是如此。

sentences.english: Until recently, there were altogether three Nine Dragon Screens in China.
sentences.chinese: 迄今为止在中国总共有三个九龙壁。

sentences.english: I just thought I'd mention it.
sentences.chinese: 就此为止，我刚想起我曾提过的。

sentences.english: There have been no defaults so far, says the company’s founder, Calvin Chin.
sentences.chinese: 距公司创始人陈国权称迄今为止还没有拖欠记录。

definition: to wait until/by the time when (sth is ready etc)
to close/to stop/to put a stop to sth/cut-off point/stopping point/deadline
ability/talent/sb of a certain type/a capable individual/only/only then/just now
a moment ago/just now/(indicating sth happening later than expected)/(preceded by a clause of condition or reason) not until/(followed by a numerical clause) only
straight (in a straight line)/continuously/always/from the beginning of ... up to .../all along
to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)
